title: Weather Monitoring
desc:
Leveraging on satellites and our Al, we keep an eye on 
weather patterns, forecast and past weather data to let 
you know about possible harmful patterns that might 
affect your crops before it happens.

title: Satellite Imagery
desc:
Access to daily 3.7-meter resolution satellite imagery, we 
support informed crop management decisions, 
enabling farmers and agronomists to monitor and maximize their 
crop health each season thereby driving precision digital 
agriculture at scale.

title: Drone Flight
desc:
Using our mobile application, we autonomously fly top of 
range fleet of multispectral drones to capture image data 
which feeds into our Agtech application platform for processing. The output is valuable and actionable insights 
for the farm owner and agronomist.

title: AI Backed
desc:
Data using state of the art artificial intelligence, we take all 
the data gathered from loT, satellite and drones to 
generate insight about your crop health.
